backend/main.mo: Defines the canister’s core data models and in‑memory OrderedMap storage for journeys, locations, albums, travel spots, user profiles, ratings, bookmarks, and related types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI update requirement and the file affected by the change.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the main React entry point and includes the SunCalc script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root that sets up theme, identity, React Query, backend debugging, and renders the LocationMapExplorer.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for managing journeys, schedules, travel spots, music albums, and geoname data with calendar popovers and CRUD operations.
Dev tool that exposes the backend actor to the browser console and logs admin‑related debug information.
frontend/src/components/CityAlbumManager: Manages city albums with media upload, validation, social media links, and album selection features.
frontend/src/components/CityloguePanel.t: File is present but contains no content.
frontend/src/components/GeonameGeographi: Manages importing, browsing, searching, and CRUD operations for Geoname city data with file parsing and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/HeartRating.tsx: Renders a 10-heart rating widget with hover, partial fill, and click-based fractional ratings.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveGlobe: Displays an interactive Three.js globe with city markers, time zones, animations, and extensive rendering controls.
frontend/src/components/LocationInfoDial: Dialog for adding, updating, or deleting location info with image upload, preview, and validation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPanel.tsx: Authentication panel using Internet Identity with login/logout, status display, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MapComponent.tsx: Leaflet-based map showing travel spots, media, bookmarks, and interactions like zoom, markers, and popups.
frontend/src/components/MediaGalleryPopu: Displays photos, videos, and social media embeds in a tabbed gallery with YouTube and Instagram URL parsing.
frontend/src/components/MusicAlbumManage: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting music albums and songs, including file uploads.
frontend/src/components/MusicPanel.tsx: Shows music albums and songs in a dialog, allowing users to browse and select tracks for playback.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayerBar.t: Audio player bar that handles song playback, progress, volume, and navigation across all albums.
frontend/src/components/TimezoneManageme: Tool for uploading, validating, storing, and manually executing GeoJSON timezone data updates.
Panel displaying journeys and itineraries with filtering, editing, and date formatting utilities.
frontend/src/components/TravelSpotManage: UI for managing travel spots with create, edit, delete, media upload, and social media link features.
frontend/src/components/VibesPanel.tsx: Displays bookmarks and travel spots grouped by city and type, with enhanced item metadata and focus callbacks.
frontend/src/components/WebsiteLayoutPan: Panel for configuring website layout settings like map options and display preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and updating a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks plus helpers for geocoding, social media URL validation, and country-name normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI color customization.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculations.ts: Contains solar declination calculation utilities and a console test suite for verifying astronomical values.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneOffsetUtils.ts: Provides functions to compute and filter timezone IDs by UTC offset using Intl-based quarter-hour precision.
frontend/src/lib/timezoneUtils.ts: Manages loading, caching, and validating timezone GeoJSON data using IndexedDB and backend fallback.
frontend/src/lib/TzOverlayV2.ts: Implements 3D globe timezone overlay rendering, including coordinate conversion, polygon cleanup, and offset-based TZ filtering.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CountryMapExplorer.ts: Empty or placeholder file for a country map explorer page.
frontend/src/pages/LocationMapExplorer.t: Main interactive map page handling search, 2D/3D map modes, globe options, travel spot focus, music controls, and UI panels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, writing, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, layout settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing an in-progress feature to enhance selected itinerary day labels with date and weekday displays.
